rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with natural light openings.
Large living area facing the West as per Vastu for relaxation and energy flow.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen.
Well-equipped kitchen with ventilation and natural light, aligning with Vastu principles for health and energy flow.
Dedicated servant's quarters located in a quiet area of the ground floor ensuring privacy.
Library space with ample shelving and comfortable seating, positioned to maximize natural light from West-facing windows.
Compact storage area for utilities and supplies.

openings.description: Main entrance door with secure access.
Side window for additional natural light and ventilation.
Service entrance for staff and deliveries.
Pathway to the swimming pool area on the rear of the plot.

vastu_considerations.energy_flow: Natural ventilation from West-facing openings; quiet zones for service areas; library positioned to receive ample evening light as per Vastu guidelines.
vastu_considerations.materials: Concrete and exposed brickwork typical of Brutalist style, ensuring a robust structure that adheres to local building norms.
